page.title: 14Worship in the Area
page.content: The churches in Milborne Port serve the area for religious services and attract people from a wide number of denominations.The two major places of worship are {The Parish Church}and { {The Methodist Church}both of which are dealt with on other pages. There is also the {United Reform} church which attracts a small congregation to its weekly services. Then there is{The Christian Fellowship made up of around 30 people who needed a free form of worship.They meet in the Village Hall on Sunday mornings and participate in a variety of other activities with like minded Christians in the West Country. The local{Roman Catholics}have a meeting place at the old Church School and hold their services at the Parish Church.
